mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ureserve1 = #{ureserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ureserve2 = #{ureserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, username, password, email, ureserve1, ureserve2 from user
